FAQ

How can I cancel my subscription?

To cancel your subscription, go to your Finance => Subscription and click Cancel subscription. Your subscription will be canceled immediately.

What if I can't find any relevant creators?

To cancel your subscription, go to your Finance => Subscription and click Cancel subscription. Your subscription will be canceled immediately.

Which social networks do you have influencers on?

To cancel your subscription, go to your Finance => Subscription and click Cancel subscription. Your subscription will be canceled immediately.

What kinds of influencers do you have in your database?

To cancel your subscription, go to your Finance => Subscription and click Cancel subscription. Your subscription will be canceled immediately.
